name: Heroes & Monsters
description:
A turn-based RPG-like game between the Heroes team and the Monsters team. If you ever played XCOM, you will feel right at home from the beginning. At the moment only local multi-player is implemented, where Heroes and Monsters take turns on the same device and battle each other.

Content-wise, only a simple campaign is part of the initial release. We have planned to include expansions and more content. Also, in future releases, we have plans for an AI for single player campaign.
